maniac:Humiliation.NAME: Humiliation
maniac:Humiliation.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you play an Attack, lose 1 Strength this turn.

maniac:Scruple.NAME: Scruple
maniac:Scruple.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn from draw pile, shuffle a temp copy of this into your draw pile.

maniac:TheUndigested.NAME: The Undigested
maniac:TheUndigested.DESCRIPTION: The Mawelling gains !M! *Swelling and heals 4 HP. NL Lose 2 *Saliva. NL Exhaust.

maniac:GloriesCard.NAME: Glory
maniac:GloriesCard.DESCRIPTION: Glories are almost harmless and will be removed(not into exhaust pile) from the combat when played.

maniac:CelebrationBus.NAME: Celebration Bus
maniac:CelebrationBus.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If you have *Rocketship *of *Learning in hand, gain [E]

maniac:RocketshipOfLearning.NAME: Rocketship of Learning
maniac:RocketshipOfLearning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL If you have *Celebration *Bus in hand, deal double damage to ALL enemies instead.

maniac:ToyExterminator.NAME: Toy Exterminator
maniac:ToyExterminator.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust ALL that cost 1 or more in hand. Deal damage double to the sum of their costs.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: One of four gifts to your best friend. It exterminates almost all kinds of bugs.

maniac:CreationScience.NAME: Creation Science
maniac:CreationScience.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a 0-cost copy of each *Glory in your deck into your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Nonbelievers were pushed off the edge of the world...unless the ones who believe in dark magics.

maniac:JarOfFireflies.NAME: Jar of Fireflies
maniac:JarOfFireflies.DESCRIPTION: Heal 1 HP whenever you play a Skill that costs 2 or more for the rest of the run.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Break this jar to let the fireflies fly away!

maniac:CorruptingMist.NAME: Corrupting Mist
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Will this ever corrupt the water source as well?

maniac:PrimordialGlyph.NAME: Primordial Glyph
maniac:PrimordialGlyph.DESCRIPTION: Choose up to !ExtraNumber! of !M! cards. NL They cost 0 this turn.

maniac:WitchHour.NAME: Witch Hour
maniac:WitchHour.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card whenever you play an Attack that costs 2 or more for the rest of combat.

maniac:UncertaintiesCard.NAME: Uncertainty
maniac:UncertaintiesCard.DESCRIPTION: Uncertainties have potential effects which may be much harmful or beneficial.

maniac:MysterySeasoning.NAME: Mystery Seasoning
maniac:MysterySeasoning.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! maniac:Plague to ALL enemies X times where X is the times this card has been played in this combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Season the hors d'oeuvres at your next three masked balls.

maniac:MysteryRecorder.NAME: Mystery Recorder
maniac:MysteryRecorder.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you play a Skill, reduce ALL debuffs on by 1.

maniac:TheTerribleSecret.NAME: The Terrible Secret
maniac:TheTerribleSecret.DESCRIPTION: Apply a random debuff at 2 amounts to ALL enemies X times where X is the number of enemies in combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The smoldering first book of a terrible trilogy that includes a terrible secret about Artifact!

maniac:Translocation.NAME: Gateway
maniac:Translocation.DESCRIPTION: Add a 0-cost temp copy of a random card in your deck to your hand for each card you play in the rest of the turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: What lies behind the gateway is unknown but could well be hostile to you - remember not to discover too much.

maniac:BrokenMagnet.NAME: Broken Magnet
maniac:BrokenMagnet.DESCRIPTION: Add a 0-cost copy of a random card to your hand. If it's not Curse, upgrade it.

maniac:RailroadXing.NAME: Railroad Xing
maniac:RailroadXing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Deal additional damage equal to the number of cards in hand.

maniac:Stellarite.NAME: Stellarite
maniac:Stellarite.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Start each combat with !M! Strength and Dexterity. NL Your Attacks exhaust when played if this is in hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It should stand the hottest breath from the old drakes.

maniac:NatureCorrupt.NAME: Corrupted Amrita
maniac:NatureCorrupt.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn from draw pile, ALL gain !M! maniac:Decay.

maniac:ShadowVisions.NAME: Shadow Visions
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: They could hide everything in the darkness if you gather too many shadows.

maniac:RisksCard.NAME: Risk
maniac:RisksCard.DESCRIPTION: Risks bring high profits, and do great harms on some occasions.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This risk may do something unexpected on some occasions.

maniac:BookOfDarkness.NAME: Book of Darkness
maniac:BookOfDarkness.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deal additional damage equal to the number of *Risks in your deck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If the unblocked damage this card deals is not enough, you will encounter a strong backlash.

maniac:PsychicNightmare.NAME: Psychic Nightmare
maniac:PsychicNightmare.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of the cards in your draw pile. NL Gain [E] for every 4 of them.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If this card isn't unleashed at the end of turn, it will bring you a potential loss of energy.

maniac:DustAndAshes.NAME: Dust and Ashes
maniac:DustAndAshes.DESCRIPTION: The enemy loses HP double to the number of the cards you've played this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If you don't have enough energy to master this power, you'd better not use it.

maniac:EvilEntity.NAME: Evil Entity
maniac:EvilEntity.DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength equal to the number of *Risks in your deck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If you can't take a high risk to use this card, just leave it behind.

maniac:ToyLeperchaun.NAME: Toy Leperchaun
maniac:ToyLeperchaun.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! maniac:Plague and !M! Weak to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This toy carries the deadly plague, do remember not to touch it.

maniac:FashionableSunglasses.NAME: Fashionable Sunglasses
maniac:FashionableSunglasses.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. If it's a Skill, deal !D! damage to a random enemy and repeat this.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It could blind you and you can't resist wearing it.

maniac:EtherDragon.NAME: Ether Drake
maniac:EtherDragon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL. NL Gain !M! maniac:Dragonscales.

maniac:FuryOfAir.NAME: Fury of Lightning
maniac:FuryOfAir.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy and ALL enemies behind it. NL Apply !M! maniac:Fragile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Block may bounce the lightning back.

maniac:GlacialMysteries.NAME: Glacial Mysteries
maniac:GlacialMysteries.DESCRIPTION: Play ALL your hand at random and increase their costs by 1 this combat.

maniac:UnwillingSacrifice.NAME: Unwilling Sacrifice
maniac:UnwillingSacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in hand. NL Increase your max health equal to its costs.

maniac:LostSoul.NAME: Lost Soul
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Discard a card in hand at random. NL Shuffle a *Dazed into your draw pile.
NL Exhaust two cards in hand at random. NL Shuffle two *Wound into your draw pile.

maniac:PossessedCard.NAME: Possessed
maniac:PossessedCard.DESCRIPTION: You can never know what it will do next exactly in advance.

maniac:BookClub.NAME: Conviction
maniac:BookClub.DESCRIPTION: All the sincere believers gather in the hall, waiting for the promised plague.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. Gain [E]. If it's the card costs 2 or more, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
Apply to ALL enemies !M! maniac:Plague for each card in your hand.
Double the amount of maniac:Plague on ALL enemies.
At the end of your turn, mark a random card. Whenever you play the marked card, gain !ExtraNumber! maniac:Plague.
Deal damage double to the amount of maniac:Plague on the enemy. Gain Block equal to the unblocked damage.

maniac:Gifts.NAME: Epilogue
maniac:Gifts.DESCRIPTION: "I have burnt down my house and all of the stuff to stay warm but not these things."
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. Add a 0-cost random card to your hand for each card exhausted.
Draw cards until your hand is full. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each card drawn.
Prevent your next !M! HP loss. NL Lose 3 Dexterity.
Whenever you deal unblocked damage to an enemy, the enemy takes 10 additional damage.
At the end of your turn, if you haven't exhausted two cards this turn, take 20 damage.

maniac:Leviathans.NAME: Leviathans
maniac:Leviathans.DESCRIPTION: No reports from all the first contacts.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal 10 or more unblocked damage, double that damage.
Remove ALL buffs on an enemy and deal 20 damage to it.
Whenever you play a Skill that cost 1 or less, take !M! damage.
Deal !D! damage X times where X is the sum of *Glories, *Uncertainties and *Risks in your deck.

maniac:PossessedCurse.NAME: Possessed Curse
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You feel a great sense of evil...
If this is removed from your deck, lose !M! max health.
At the end of turn, lost !M! Dexterity if this is in hand.
At the end of turn, lost !M! Strength if this is in hand.
At the end of turn, if the cards you've played this turn is less than !M!, take !D! damage.
Whenever a monster dies, you lose !M! gold. If you don't have enough gold, lose HP instead.
While in hand, ALL enemies gain !M! *Plated *Armor whenever you play a card.

maniac:Unidentified.NAME: The Unidentified
maniac:Unidentified.DESCRIPTION: When played, choose a play effect of a random. NL If this chooses a Curse, shuffle that curse into your discard pile.
